ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lots-o-questions...
ygData.msgSnippet: Dang, sorry I missed you.  Atonal didn t get logged on this weekend, only because my guild grouping partners never showed, at least when I was on. That and my
ygData.messageBody:
Dang, sorry I missed you. Atonal didn't get logged on this weekend, only
because my guild grouping partners never showed, at least when I was on.
That and my druid was almost 19, and I really was psyched about being able
to self teleport...hehe...and trying to do the bone talisman quest. Just
way into the druid. :) Speaking of bone talisman...about 2 hours killing
that dumb tiger, and nothing but ruined cat pelts... :/ If anyone here on
Xegony has a tiger hide laying around, I'll buy it...hehe.

At

-----Original Message-----
From: Robert(Bob) Smith [mailto:rws1111@...]
Sent: Monday, January 15, 2001 9:52 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Lots-o-questions...


#1) The new changes with Selos has added some new excitement to the
game - I think I was more scared running through Burning Woods
yesterday than I have been since I first entered the zone. In the
past, I always knew I could outrun anything I might aggro... yesterday,
I was not so sure. *Grins*

#2) I have been thinking about trying to get a SS bracer, but really
do not want to put the time in the camp. EQ Prices has them listed in
the 2K-2.5K range, but a couple of my friends kinda laughed and said
I would be looking in the 10K-15K range... what is the price of the
bracer, and how good are they? (BTW, this is on Xegony.)

#3) Speaking of equipment, I think it is time I look at replacing my
Lizardscale cloak. (I am level 52) I have been getting a LOT of grief
from my guildmates over this (much as I did when they found out I was
still wearing a collar of undead protection.) Any suggestions?

#4) I have been having some trouble evaluating the worth of the level
52 song. Have anyone found it to good/bad?

Other Comments:
*) Tawney: Still in 59? I am rooting for ya!
*) Dark: Sorry I could not chat more in HS last night... I hope your
raid went well.
*) Atonal: I looked for you this weekend, but did not see you online.
Maybe I was looking at the wrong time?
*) Slyde: Better hurry out of 52, or I might just beat ya to 53.
*Grins*


Gaelthorne
Xegony



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
